name: VR Spaceship Battle
description:
Try the classic spaceship arcade game in a 21st century VR headset.
This game brings the feel of childhood back, in a VR Spaceship Battle.

Float through space and destroy the enemy ships before they shoot you.
The gameplay is seated and the ship is controlled with your VR controllers.
Left controller can shoot guns, while right controller may fire missle weapons.

Just hold, relax and shoot alien spaceships. You can save the Galaxy, and be a hero of the Solar System.

In the game, you can freely control the spacecraft to fly. Shooting missiles to hit all designated targets is victory. Of course, you will be hit by enemy missiles at any time. Avoid the missiles as much as possible and hit the key points of the enemy spacecraft.
